w9s03lw3WIY.title: What is the difference between Power Virtual Agents and Microsoft Copilot Studio?
w9s03lw3WIY.author: Dewain Robinson - The Copilot Studio Dude
w9s03lw3WIY.description:
In this video I go over the difference between what used to be Power Virtual Agents and Microsoft Copilot Studio.  I also explain the difference between extending Copilots vs building Copilots.

Please like and subscribe to my channel and post comments on what you would like to see in the future.

Try Copilot Studio at https://aka.ms/TryCopilotStudio
